targets.expr: {job="blue_iris"} |= "Started version" | regexp `Started version (?P<version>[0-9.]+)`
{job="blue_iris"} |= "Current profile" | regexp `Current profile (?P<profile>.+)`
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris", level="error"} [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris", level="warning"} [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI has been restarted" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI: is being started|AI is being restarted" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI: has been started|AI has been started" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI: timeout" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI: error" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum(count_over_time({job="blue_iris"} |~ "AI: not responding" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum by(object, alert_type) (count_over_time({job="blue_iris", duration!="", object=~"$camera", ai_object=~"$object", alert_type=~"$type"} [$__auto]))
{job="blue_iris", duration!="", object=~"$camera", ai_object=~"$object", alert_type=~"$type"}
sum by(object) (count_over_time({job="blue_iris", object=~"$camera"} |~ "Trigger:" !~ "Alert confirmed|Alert canceled" [$__range]))
sum by(object) (count_over_time({job="blue_iris", object=~"$camera"} |~ "Push:" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
sum by(object) (count_over_time({job="blue_iris", object=~"$camera"} |~ "Trigger:" !~ "Alert confirmed|Alert canceled" [5m]))
sum by(object) (count_over_time({job="blue_iris", object=~"$camera"} |~ "Push:" [$__range])) or on() vector(0)
avg by (object) (last_over_time({job="blue_iris", disk_pct!="", disk_pct!~"%.+"} | unwrap disk_pct [$__range]))
avg by (object) (last_over_time({job="blue_iris", hours_pct!="", hours_pct!~"%.+"} | unwrap hours_pct [$__range]))
avg by (object) (last_over_time({job="blue_iris", disk_free!=""} | unwrap disk_free [$__range]))
{job="blue_iris", level="error"}
{job="blue_iris", level="warning"}
